short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This project is using HTML5 Web Speech Recognition API which can translate your speech to text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This project depends on Google Speech-to-Text Engine and Service, and make sure your network is available connected to Google.
